babel: Zambiri za Babel kwa wogwiritsa ntchito
babel-desc: Ikuwonjezera #babel parser ntchito kuti ilowetse mzere wokhazikika wa khola la bokosi la bokosi labelle ndi kuthekera kuphatikiza mafayilo apamwamba
babel-autocreate-text-levels: Ogwiritsa ntchito m'derali amasonyeza kuti ali ndi luso la $1 la chinenero $2.
babel-autocreate-text-main: Ogwiritsa ntchito m'gulu lino amasonyeza chidziwitso chawo cha chinenero $1.
babel-0: Wosuta ali ndi [[$1|palibe]] chidziwitso cha [[$2|$3]] (kapena kumvetsa ndi vuto lalikulu).
babel-4: Wogwiritsa ntchitoyo ali [[$1|pafupi ndi wolankhulira]] akudziŵa bwino [[$2|$3]].
babel-0-n: Wogwiritsa ntchitoyo [[$1|sadziwa]] [[$2|Chichewa]] (kapena amazimvetsa ndi vuto lalikulu).
babel-2-n: Wosuta ali ndi chidziwitso [[$1|chapakati]] cha chachikulu [[$2|Chichewa]].
babel-4-n: Wogwiritsa ntchitoyo ali [[$1|pafupi ndi wolankhulira]] akudziŵa bwino za [[$2|Chichewa]].
babel-5-n: Wosutayu ali ndi [[$1|nzeru zapamwamba]] chachikulu cha [[$2|Chichewa]].
apihelp-query+babel-description: Pezani zambiri pazinenero zomwe wosuta amadziwa
apihelp-query+babel-summary: Pezani zambiri pazinenero zomwe wosuta amadziwa
apihelp-query+babel-example-1: Pezani zambiri za Babel kwa mtumiaji <kbd>Chitsanzo</kbd>
